title: Go vet is missing
body:
by **alexandru@mosoi.ro**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
$ go vet

What is the expected output?
go vet should vet my files

What do you see instead?
exec: "/home/alexandru/source/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/vet": stat
/home/alexandru/source/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/vet: no such file or directory


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g


Which operating system are you using?
GNU/Linux (Debian testing)

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
0fa62412dbdd
